Package com.example.homeheirs

package com.example.homeheirs
  • Class
    Description
    AddItemFragment
    A DialogFragment for adding or editing items in the item list.
    AddItemFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    Interface for communication between the fragment and the activity.
    AddTagFragment
    Class for Implementing the logic behind the Add Tag Dialog Extends Dialog fragment
    AddTagFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    Method that describes interface that should be implemented in main Currently not in use
    CaptureAct
     
    ChoosePhotoOptionFragment
     
    ChoosePhotoOptionFragment.CameraFragmentlistener
     
    FirebaseOperations
    This is a class that is reposible for all database interactions Involves method for adding items, tags, as well as deleting items
    ImageAdapter
    Class that Handles our Gridview and Displaying all the images in the Gridview Source: Youtube URL:
    Item
    Represents an item in the item list.
    login
    Class Responsible for the initial login screen on startup using Firebase auth Source used: Youtube video URL: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QAKq8UBv4GI
    MainActivity
    MainActivity serves as the main entry point for the Home Heirs apps.
    RecyclerViewAdapter
    Class Made to implement a recycle view to help with effieciency, ease of use, and flexibility.
    RecyclerViewAdapter.ItemClickListener
    Interface implemented in main, allows to get the position of object
    Register
    Class That takes an email and password and creates an account using Firebase auth
    Scanner
    The Scanner class is responsible for handling barcode scanning functionality using the ZXing library and making API requests to retrieve product information.
    Scanner.OnScanActivityListener
    Interface to be implemented by activities or fragments listening for scan results.
    ShowEnlargedImageFragment
    Class for Showning an Enlarged object dialogfragment The Fragment gives the option of deleting the image which this class handles
    ShowEnlargedImageFragment.EnlargedFragmentlistener
    Describes a interface to be implemented into the showItemsactivity to handle the delete
    ShowItemActivity
    ShowItemActivity displays the details of an item and allows the user to edit and save the changes.
    Tag
    This is a class that keeps track of all tags created
    userProfile
    Class thats responsible for showing some user information (thier email) as well as handling the logout
